verses.verse: For I have taken<WH5414> all<WH3605> this<WH2088> to my heart<WH3820> and explain<WH952> it that righteous<WH6662> men,<WH6662> wise<WH2450> men,<WH2450> and their deeds<WH5652> are in the hand<WH3027> of God.<WH430> Man<WH120> does not know<WH3045> whether<WH1571> [it will be] love<WH160> or<WH1571> hatred;<WH8135> anything<WH3605> awaits<WH6440> him.

It is the same<WH9201> for all.<WH3605> There is one<WH259> fate<WH4745> for the righteous<WH6662> and for the wicked;<WH7563> for the good,<WH2896> for the clean,<WH2889> and for the unclean;<WH2931> for the man who offers<WH2076> a sacrifice<WH2076> and for the one who<WH834> does not sacrifice.<WH2076> As the good<WH2896> man<WH2896> is, so is the sinner;<WH2398> as the swearer<WH7650> is, so<WH9201> is the one who is afraid<WH3372> to swear.<WH7621>

This<WH2088> is an evil<WH7451> in all<WH3605> that is done<WH6213> under<WH8478> the sun,<WH8121> that there is one<WH259> fate<WH4745> for all<WH3605> men.<WH3605> Furthermore,<WH1571> the hearts<WH3820> of the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120> are full<WH4392> of evil,<WH9563> and insanity<WH1947> is in their hearts<WH3824> throughout their lives.<WH9132> Afterwards<WH310> they [go] to the dead.<WH4191>

For whoever<WH4310> <WH834> is joined<WH2266> with all<WH3605> the living,<WH2416> there<WH3426> is hope;<WH986> surely<WH3588> a live<WH2416> dog<WH3611> is better<WH2896> than<WH4480> a dead<WH4191> lion.<WH9030>

For the living<WH2416> know<WH3045> they will die;<WH4191> but the dead<WH4191> do not know<WH3045> anything,<WH3972> nor<WH369> have<WH369> they any<WH5750> longer<WH5750> a reward,<WH7939> for their memory<WH2143> is forgotten.<WH7911>

Indeed<WH1571> their love,<WH160> their hate,<WH8135> and their zeal<WH7068> have already<WH3528> perished, and they will no<WH6> longer<WH369> have<WH5750> a share<WH369> in all<WH2506> that is done<WH3605> under<WH6213> the sun.<WH8478>

Go<WH1980> [then,] eat<WH398> your bread<WH3899> in happiness,<WH8057> and drink<WH8354> your wine<WH3196> with a cheerful<WH2896> heart;<WH3820> for God<WH430> has already<WH3528> approved<WH7521> your works.<WH4639>
Let your clothes<WH899> be white<WH3836> all<WH3605> the time,<WH6256> and let not oil<WH8081> be lacking<WH2637> on your head.<WH7218>

Enjoy<WH7200> life<WH9132> with the woman<WH802> whom<WH834> you love<WH157> all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of your fleeting<WH1892> life<WH9132> which<WH834> He has given<WH5414> to you under<WH8478> the sun;<WH8121> for this<WH1931> is your reward<WH2506> in life,<WH9132> and in your toil<WH5999> in which<WH834> you have labored<WH6001> under<WH8478> the sun.<WH8121>

Whatever<WH3605> <WH834> your hand<WH3027> finds<WH4672> to do,<WH6213> verily, do<WH6213> [it] with all your might;<WH3581> for there<WH369> is no<WH369> activity<WH4639> or planning<WH2803> or knowledge or wisdom<WH2451> in Sheol<WH7585> where<WH834> <WH8033> you are going.<WH1980>

I again<WH7725> saw<WH7200> under<WH8478> the sun<WH8121> that the race<WH4793> is not to the swift,<WH7031> and the battle<WH4421> is not to the warriors,<WH1368> and neither<WH1571> <WH3808> is bread<WH3899> to the wise,<WH2450> nor<WH3808> <WH1571> wealth<WH6239> to the discerning,<WH995> nor<WH3808> <WH1571> favor<WH2580> to men of ability;<WH3045> for time<WH6256> and chance<WH6294> overtake<WH7136> them all.<WH3605>

Moreover,<WH3588> <WH1571> man<WH120> does not know<WH3045> his time:<WH6256> like fish<WH1709> caught<WH270> in a treacherous<WH7451> net,<WH4685> and birds<WH6833> trapped<WH270> in a snare,<WH6341> so the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120> are ensnared<WH3369> at an evil<WH7451> time<WH6256> when it suddenly<WH6597> falls<WH5307> on them.
Also<WH1571> this<WH2090> I came to see<WH7200> as wisdom<WH2451> under<WH8478> the sun,<WH8121> and it impressed<WH1419> me.

There was a small<WH6996> city<WH5892> with few<WH4592> men<WH376> in it and a great<WH1419> king<WH4428> came<WH935> to it, surrounded<WH5437> it, and constructed<WH1129> large<WH1419> siegeworks<WH9284> against<WH5921> it.

But there was found<WH4672> in it a poor<WH4542> wise<WH2450> man<WH376> and he delivered<WH4422> the city<WH5892> by his wisdom.<WH2451> Yet no<WH3808> one<WH120> remembered<WH2142> that poor<WH4542> man.<WH376>

So I said,<WH559> "Wisdom<WH2451> is better<WH2896> than<WH4480> strength.<WH1369>" But the wisdom<WH2451> of the poor<WH4542> man<WH4542> is despised<WH959> and his words<WH1697> are not heeded.<WH8085>
The words<WH1697> of the wise<WH2450> heard<WH8085> in quietness<WH5183> are [better] than<WH4480> the shouting<WH2199> of a ruler<WH4910> among fools.<WH3684>
Wisdom<WH2451> is better<WH2896> than<WH4480> weapons<WH3627> of war,<WH7128> but one<WH259> sinner<WH2398> destroys much<WH6> good.<WH7235>
